newsitem.title: USA: Security Dynamics unit settles dispute.
newsitem.headline: Security Dynamics unit settles dispute.

text.p: RSA Data Security Inc, a subsidiary of Security Dynamics Technologies Inc, and Cylink Corp said Tuesday they had settled all outstanding litigation between them.

The two companies said the settlement calls for Cylink to grant to RSA all necessary rights to Cylink's Stanford patents, and for RSA to grant to Cylink a license to RSA's cryptographic software toolkits.
The companies said the settlement "ends further prolongation of a legal dispute that has been costly and distracting."
RSA said it is fulfilling its promise to customers to resolve disputes with Cylink.
Cylink, under new management, is refocusing on providing end-to-end data security products and solutions.
